title: Boldy James joins the show
description:
Griselda fam's Boldy James sits down with J&J to talk about his new album, "Mr. Ten08." We catch up with him about his FOUR-album year, the pain of Detroit fandom, and his 5 favorite storytellers in hiphop history. And also, we go DEEP on the Kyrie Irving saga. What it means for him, his teammates, the Nets organization, and where we go from here. It's a lot to digest... But, pull up, anyway. We got you.

itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
itunes:subtitle: J&J: Griselda Fam's Boldy James Stops By Jalen & Jacoby
